p: Amplification by Real-time RT-PCR assay for DENV, CHIKV, and ZIKV was performed with the primers and the probe used for DENV, CHIKV, and ZIKV described by Leparc-Goffart et al. [ 15], Panning M et al. [ 16] and Faye et al. [ 17], respectively. The PCR conditions were described by SÃ¡nchez-Carbonel et al. [ 7].
